modName: Angel And Fallen Race 3.0 (The Old Dragons) test
summary:
this is an updated version of 3.0 (updated)
<br />fix the armor problem
<br />added mounts
<br />added to the light plane
<br />also on Steam
<br />this is still in a test stage until i can fix issues, and add to the mod
<br />
descriptionHtml:
This is the Angel and fallen race 3.0
fixes include armor fix angels and fallen can now wear regular armor
added mounts original angel and fallen have three mounts horse,wolf and dragon
khajiit and argonian angel and fallen races have one mount sabercat and ground dragon 
added some ligthing effects to the plane of light 

List of things i want to add 
fix the gaurds in the plane of light 
fix the seraphim angels spawn point 
add to the dark realm more foot soldiers and add npcs to lava for more immersion
Fly over the lava theres a chest and also a boss to fight watch out he lvls with you
author: WindGaze
